bill.summary:
Supporting American Printed Circuit Boards Act of 2022
This bill establishes a business tax credit for the purchase of printed circuit boards manufactured in the United States. It also provides financial incentives for entities that invest in facilities and equipment in the United States for manufacturing (or research and development of) printed circuit boards.
